channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- QRadar SIEM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- QRadar SIEM

item.title: CVE-2022-30613|2024-08-03T06:56:12.988Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.4 and 7.5 could disclose sensitive information via a local service to a privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 227366.

item.title: CVE-2022-22320|2024-08-03T03:07:50.452Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 218367.

item.title: CVE-2022-22345|2024-08-03T03:14:54.990Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 220041.

item.title: CVE-2022-34351|2024-08-03T09:07:16.147Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.4 and 7.5 is vulnerable to information exposure allowing a non-tenant user with a specific domain security profile assigned to see some data from other domains. IBM X-Force ID: 230402.

item.title: CVE-2022-22480|2024-08-03T03:14:55.322Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.4 and 7.5 data node rebalancing does not function correctly when using encrypted hosts which could result in information disclosure. IBM X-Force ID: 225889.

item.title: CVE-2022-22424|2024-08-03T03:14:55.128Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information from the TLS key file due to incorrect file permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 223597.

item.title: CVE-2024-28784|2024-08-02T00:56:58.190Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285893.

item.title: CVE-2024-27269|2024-08-02T00:27:59.955Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow a privileged user to configure user management that would disclose unintended sensitive information across tenants. IBM X-Force ID: 284575.

item.title: CVE-2023-50949|2024-06-26T15:37:11.292Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 275706.

item.title: CVE-2024-27269|2024-06-04T17:47:00.230Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow a privileged user to configure user management that would disclose unintended sensitive information across tenants. IBM X-Force ID: 284575.

item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 275706.
